title: Delayed Function Execution | Challenge
description: In Python, sometimes we need to delay the execution of a function for a certain amount of time. This can be useful in scenarios where we want to wait for a certain event to occur before executing a function. In this challenge, you will be asked to create a function that delays the execution of another function by a specified amount of time.
